description: Many opposition politicians vowed to boycott an event to commemorate the Royal Irish Constabulary.
title: Leo Varadkar: United Ireland 'further away' after RIC controversy
title_page: Leo Varadkar: United Ireland 'further away' after RIC controversy - BBC News
maintext: However, he added that a united Ireland must be one that recognises a shared history and that there are "one million people on the island who identify as British and as being from a unionist background".
